result.reason: The custom search control (MrngSearchBox) fails to properly acquire input focus when the user performs a drag-select ('painting') operation on existing text. This prevents immediate editing. Forcing focus on mouse interaction will ensure standard behavior.
result.approach: Override the OnMouseDown event in MrngSearchBox.cs to explicitly call this.Focus(). This ensures that any mouse interaction, including text selection, properly activates the control for input.
